message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation.
Your share decreases with each round Alice, let's settle this quickly. I'll take a little less than half.
Bob, my offer still stands. The inflation is hurting me, not you. Let's be reasonable.
This is getting us nowhere Alice.  I'm increasing my offer, but this is as high as I'm willing to go.
Bob, I'm losing money fast because of the inflation. I need you to meet me halfway here. This offer is a compromise.
Alice, this is ridiculous. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
